mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sentence(sno, bno, sentence) values(seq_sentence.nextval, #{bno}, #{sentence})
mapper.select: select sno, bno, sentence, createdate, modifieddate from tbl_sentence where sno = #{sno}
select sno, bno, sentence, createdate, modifieddate from tbl_sentence where bno = ${bno} order by sno asc
mapper.update: update tbl_sentence set sentence = #{sentence}, modifieddate = sysdate where sno = #{sno}
